channel.title: Scar problem!
channel.description: i have been using scar for about 7 months and until recently (after i started using aryan for 4 days...yes i am an aryan noob), my scar scripts wont work!!! for instance........my iron minerbanker in varrok will compile and will say script running....... but it wont click anything!!!! i even tried redownloading scar but that didnt fix problem! wtf!!! :mad:[br][size=1]Posted at: May 18, 2006, 01:22:24 pm[/size][hr]sry didnt kno sum1 already posted that problem....my bad

item.title: Scar problem!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The colors and some things were raped by the new update. So, i would advise finding yourself another script.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar problem!
item.dc:creator: @ore_hoar_dynasty ore hoar dynasty
item.description:
@ore_hoar_dynasty wrote:

includes are for procedures such as mapwalkng or antirandoms…i think i wud kno wat they were and wat they did if i have been using scar for 7 months… u kno?
i have all includes that are necessary to use my scripts
[br][size=1]Posted at: May 20, 2006, 11:09:19 am[/size][hr]i appreciate the suggestion though[br][size=1]Posted at: May 20, 2006, 11:10:32 am[/size][hr]i think i will try it anyway because i am desperate :)[br][size=1]Posted at: May 20, 2006, 11:12:37 am[/size][hr]i tried redownloading the includes but no change…(mouse will not move to click any colors)

Read full topic

try downloading includes (file> download includes)
